New Records: Suryakumar Yadav is voted man of the match
Key Match Events: India dismissed the deadly Afghani openers Gurbaz and Zadran early in the powerplay
Wickets fell at regular intervals as Afghanistan failed to build any partnerships in their innings
Arshdeep Singh picks up the wicket of Noor Ahmad on the last ball of the innings to seal a dominant 47 runs win for India
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma on the win
Suryakumar Yadav: ‘Lots of routine’ behind my success
Miscellaneous Highlights: Superb play with the bat and ball today from India
A real signal of intent from India. The World Cup final will be played at the same ground, and if India continue the same way, they’ll back themselves to be back here.
Others: India reached 181 on a difficult pitch
